title: Sinnerman // Good Omens Animation
author: AlphaCentauri900
comment: Crowley panicking around a calm but concerned Aziraphale in the book shop, desperately praying to God only to be cast away and lose all hope, Aziraphale coming in to stop any further desperate stupidity happening, and Crowley just breaking down like "oh god, finally someone to help me." All of this with FREAKING STICK PEOPLE
This is so simple but incredible, how did you manage to convey so much emotion with faceless stick people?? 😂
This was so good! I liked the fact that Aziraphale's figure being the only one lined with white? It's a pretty neat detail!
Now, Imagine this with cover by Tom Ellis from 'Lucifer ' show
description:
Something dark and unpleasant is after Crowley, and he can't handle it alone...

This was my first time doing any sort of animation, so it was a bit of a challenge! Take pity on my close-ups. There are approximately 670 hand-drawn frames, and it took about two and a quarter days to put together.

Song: Sinnerman
Artist: Nina Simone
Fandom: Good Omens (Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett)
Software: Adobe Photoshop CC 2018

ImprobableDreams900 on tumblr and AO3

No copyright infringement intended.
